content: उद्धत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Raised up, elevated, lifted up; लांगूलमुद्धतं धुन्वन् <ls>Bk. 9. 7</ls>; आत्मोद्धतैरपि रजोभिः <ls>Ś. 1. 8</ls> raised; खुर° <ls>R. 9. 50</ls>, heaved; <ls>Ki. 8. 53.</ls> {@--2@} Excessive, very much, exceeding. {@--3@} Haughty, vain, puffed up; अक्षवधोद्धतः <ls>R. 12. 63.</ls> {@--4@} Harsh; <ls>Śi. 16. 27.</ls> {@--5@} Excited, inflamed, intensified; °मनोभवरागा <ls>Ki. 9. 68</ls>, <ls n="Ki. 9.">69</ls>; मदोद्धताः प्रत्यनिलं विचेरुः <ls>Ku. 3. 31.</ls> {@--6@} Majestic, stately; ill-mannered. --तः A king's wrestler.
